title: Two bedroom Located on a quiet heart on SOMA with remodeled kitchen w
posting_body: Located on a quiet cul-de-sac off Brannan St, this modern loft is in the heart of SOMA.
Built-in 1997, interiors were designed with a clean, modern aesthetic, high-quality finishes & appliances, with a unifying sense of space.
This Immaculate Live/Work Loft is a paradigm of contemporary living, boasting an open layout.

The main-level living area features a Living/Dining, breakfast bar, powder room, remodeled kitchen w/ professional grade appliances, wood-burning fireplace & In-Unit W/D. Wall of oversized windows with western exposures, this loft allows you to gaze upon city life while providing a sanctuary from the hustle & bustle of SOMA.
The spacious upper-level loft contains a primary suite w/a a luxurious spa-like bath & grand walk-in closet while 1st level features a bedroom, bathroom, private patio, and home office/study.
Enclosed private parking garage, storage & private entrance complete this unit.
Enjoy easy access to downtown, the financial district, Caltrain, 280/101.
Modern luxury awaits you at 25 Lucerne
